verses.text: \w Faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w saying|strong="G3056"\w*, \w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w a|strong="G1487"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* seeketh \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w office|strong="G1984"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w a|strong="G1487"\w* \w bishop|strong="G1984"\w*, \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \w desireth|strong="G1937"\w* \w a|strong="G1487"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*.

\w no|strong="G3361"\w* brawler, \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w striker|strong="G4131"\w*; \w but|strong="G3361"\w* \w gentle|strong="G1933"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* contentious, \w no|strong="G3361"\w* lover \w of|strong="G3361"\w* money;

\w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w a|strong="G1519"\w* \w novice|strong="G3504"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* \w being|strong="G2443"\w* puffed \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \w fall|strong="G1706"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w condemnation|strong="G2917"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*.

\w Moreover|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w without|strong="G3361"\w*; \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w fall|strong="G1706"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w reproach|strong="G3680"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w snare|strong="G3803"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*.

\w Deacons|strong="G1249"\w* \w in|strong="G4183"\w* like \w manner|strong="G5615"\w* \add must be\add* \w grave|strong="G4586"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w double-tongued|strong="G1351"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w given|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G3361"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* greedy \w of|strong="G1249"\w* filthy lucre;

\w holding|strong="G2192"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w pure|strong="G2513"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G1161"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w proved|strong="G1381"\w*; \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G1161"\w* \w them|strong="G3778"\w* \w serve|strong="G1247"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w deacons|strong="G1247"\w*, \w if|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* blameless.

\w Women|strong="G1135"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* like \w manner|strong="G5615"\w* \add must be\add* \w grave|strong="G4586"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w slanderers|strong="G1228"\w*, \w temperate|strong="G3524"\w*, \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G1510"\w* \w deacons|strong="G1249"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* husbands \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w ruling|strong="G4291"\w* \add their\add* \w children|strong="G5043"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w houses|strong="G3624"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w served|strong="G1247"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w* \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w deacons|strong="G1247"\w* \w gain|strong="G4046"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* standing, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w boldness|strong="G3954"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w write|strong="G1125"\w* \w I|strong="G3778"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* thee, \w hoping|strong="G1679"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* thee \w shortly|strong="G5034"\w*;

\w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* tarry \w long|strong="G1019"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w thou|strong="G1437"\w* mayest \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* behave \w themselves|strong="G1722"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w pillar|strong="G4769"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ground|strong="G1477"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* truth.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w without|strong="G2532"\w* \w controversy|strong="G3672"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w*; \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w manifested|strong="G5319"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w Justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w Seen|strong="G3708"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* angels, \w Preached|strong="G2784"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w*, \w Believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, Received \w up|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*.
